Action.Str: var now = Date.now(); var yesterday = now - (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000); setLocal('end_ms', String(now)); setLocal('start_ms', String(yesterday)); flash('Nexus Health: start=' + String(yesterday) + ' end=' + String(now));
var r = '%healthconnectresult'; setLocal('steps_raw', r); flash('Steps raw: ' + r.substring(0, 80));
var r = '%healthconnectresult'; setLocal('hr_raw', r); flash('HR raw: ' + r.substring(0, 80));
cat /sys/class/power_supply/battery/capacity 2>/dev/null || dumpsys battery 2>/dev/null | grep level | tr -d ' ' | cut -d: -f2
